Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Wakeforest Drive, between the luxurious Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge on the east and the prestigious Iilandi University on the west.
Room.LongDescription: The Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge is one of the most popular Inns in the City, mostly because of its very luxurious rooms and the atmosphere surrounding the Inn. It is considerably safer than most of the other Inns, located around troubled spots in the city.
